B

BOUNDED_BUFFER_CAPACITY - Static variable in class SortFiles
Capacity of bounded-buffers (queues) used
BoundedBuffer<T> - Class in <Unnamed>
A bounded buffer is a FIFO queue with a limited number of elements that can be stored in it.

Constructor.

D

dequeue() - Method in class BoundedBuffer
Dequeues next element from the queue.

E

Enqueues an element as the last one in queue.

This thread is responsible to read all '.unsorted' files from a given directory.
SortTask - Class in <Unnamed>
